com.soen6441.core.tower

Class EnergyTower

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.soen6441.core.map.MapItem
        • com.soen6441.core.tower.Tower
          • com.soen6441.core.tower.EnergyTower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IArchive, TimerListener

    public class EnergyTower
extends Tower
    This class is a specific type of tower, EnergyTower. A EnergyTower does not attack any targets but enhance the power of other towers in its range.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Haiyang Sun
    See Also:
    Tower
